A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly my favorite of the entire Star Wars franchise. Walked out of the theater on a cloud. Finally heroes and villains who aren't mere cardboard cutouts but show humor\, empathy and most importantly a struggle with the decisions they have made and must continue to make. Mark Hamill's performance as a grizzled Luke Skywalker was a beautiful redemption of what I always felt was the most weakly portrayed and insufficiently developed character in the  original trilogy. He lent this film the sagacity and gravitas required of a future classic in cinema history\, which is what I do believe The Last Jedi will eventually become. Well done to Rian Johnson and the team for having the guts to revolutionize a franchise that was in need of a systems upgrade.
